context.comment1: [?]:usr-signup]:security - [loginPageDomainPrefix: staging-hjolystratos] The prefix of the user pool web UI for users to log in. The complete URL is https://<loginPageDomainPrefix>.auth.<region>.amazoncognito.com
context.comment: [N]:part-I-addendum]:domain - The domain of your application, without protocol
context.comment2: [N]:part-I-addendum]:cert - The arn for the SSL certificate for your custom domain.
context.comment3: [N]:part-I-addendum]:a_record - The domain name for the hosted zone within Route53.
context.comment4: [N]: Specifies the source of the Docker image that we want to deploy.
